member.name: M:SilenceCutter.VideoManipulating.VideoSpeedManipulator.ChangeSpeed(System.Double,System.Double,System.String,Xabe.FFmpeg.Events.ConversionProgressEventHandler)
member.param: noise change speed (0.25, 0.5 ...) WARNING: if you set this param more than ~ 10 (depends of the smallest duration value in list TimeLineVolume), it will corrupt the output final video
video part extension in temp directory like .mp4, .mkv, ... etc.(use same extension as origin video files to make faster conversion)
silence change speed (0.25, 0.5 ...) WARNING: if you set this param more than ~ 10 (depends of the smallest duration value in list TimeLineVolume), it will corrupt the output final video

member.name: T:SilenceCutter.VideoRedactor
member.summary: main class that uses all instrument of this package it can cut silence(noise), speed up silence(noise)

member.name: P:SilenceCutter.VideoRedactor.PreferExtension
member.summary: prefer extension for video parts in temp dir and for output video

member.name: P:SilenceCutter.VideoRedactor.PartsContainer
member.summary: get container for parts container WARNING: every get create new VideoPartsContainer (for sync List with this container)

member.name: M:SilenceCutter.VideoRedactor.DetectVolume(System.Single,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: you have to call this method, because we can't cut or speed up noise or silence with out detecting
member.param: millisec to calc average amlitude of block of samples
after detecting we will add to noise this number of millisec

member.name: M:SilenceCutter.VideoRedactor.Cut(SilenceCutter.Detecting.VolumeValue)
member.param: volume level (silence, noise) to cut out

member.name: M:SilenceCutter.VideoRedactor.Start(System.Double,System.Double)
member.summary: start conversion WARNING: if you set this param more than ~ 10 (depends of the millisec arg in DetectVolume method), it will corrupt the output final video if you want to cut silence out , We recommended method Cut in this instance
member.param: silence speed. WARNING: if you set this param more than ~ 10 (depends of the millisec arg in DetectVolume method), it will corrupt the output final video
noise speed. WARNING: if you set this param more than ~ 10 (depends of the millisec arg in DetectVolume method), it will corrupt the output final video

member.name: M:SilenceCutter.VideoRedactor.GetMaxAbsAmplitudeInAudioStream
member.summary: this method should help to choose right threshold amplitude for method VolumeDetect
member.returns: max abs amplitude in audio stream

member.summary: remove temp dir with all contain files

member.summary: Volume value like Silence or Noise

member.summary: Reformating DetectedTime into start-end TimeSpan list

member.summary: if time span is less than the value, this time span will be marged with previous time span
member.param: if time span is less than the value, this time span will be marged with previous time span

member.name: M:SilenceCutter.Detecting.VolumeDetector.MergeTimeLines
member.summary: Merge close Time lines if volume the same

member.name: M:SilenceCutter.Detecting.VolumeDetector.DeleteEmptyTimeLines
member.summary: delete all time lines where duration is 0

member.name: M:SilenceCutter.Detecting.VolumeDetector.ExtendNoiseReduceSilence(System.Int32)
member.summary: extend each noise time span on paticular number, WARNING: Can use only if in list have not same volume at next or previous indexes of the value ( use method MergeTimeLine )

member.name: M:SilenceCutter.Detecting.VolumeDetector.DetectVolumeLevel(System.Single,System.Int32)
member.summary: detect volume level in audio file
member.param: we split all audio on millisec blocks and detect this block as silence or sound
member.returns: List of Time duration and Volume level ( Sound or Silence )

member.name: M:SilenceCutter.Detecting.VolumeDetector.GetRecommendedMillisec
member.summary: Get recommended millisec for method DetectVolumeLevel
member.returns: millisec (less than 1000) that you should put in "DetectVolumeLevel" method

member.summary: Get max amplitude ( for right choose silence threshold for method DetectSilenceLevel() )
